name: The Wall Fighter
description:
Game for Roll The Dice #2 game jam.

The theme is 3 random nouns which when selected they were selected as...

The idea is simple. Two walls attacking each other. The main weapon, a deadly piece of yarn.

Controls

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

1 - Holster

2 - Yarn Gun 

Page Up/Down - Zoom

C - Toggle Camera Mode

Left Mouse Button - Shoot
